verbs.description: roro pineapple cookies [ARG0: my memories of christmas] [ARGM-TMP: always] [V: include] [ARG1: my mom pineapple cookies the kids called her roro] and we still make them every year to keep her memory alive you can substitute your favorite flavor of preserves for the pineapple —donna scarano east hanover new jersey
